scripts.mantic:build: ng build mantic-ui --prod && cd projects\mantic-ui && npm run postbuild && cd ..\..
scripts.mantic:publish-rc: cd dist\mantic-ui --tag rc && npm publish && cd ..\..
scripts.fomantic:build: ng build fomantic-ui --prod && cd projects\fomantic-ui && npm run postbuild && cd ..\..
scripts.semantic:build: ng build semantic-ui --prod && cd projects\semantic-ui && npm run postbuild && cd ..\..
scripts.semantic:publish-rc: cd dist\semantic-ui && npm publish --tag rc && cd ..\..
scripts.link:fomantic: rd /S/Q node_modules\@mantic-ui\fomantic-ui-angular & mkdir @mantic-ui\fomantic-ui-angular & cd @mantic-ui\fomantic-ui-angular && mklink /D lib ..\..\projects\fomantic-ui\src\lib & mklink index.ts ..\..\projects\fomantic-ui\src\public-api.ts & cd ..\..\..
scripts.link:semantic: rd /S/Q node_modules\@mantic-ui\semantic-ui-angular & mkdir @mantic-ui\semantic-ui-angular & cd @mantic-ui\semantic-ui-angular && mklink /D lib ..\..\projects\semantic-ui\src\lib & mklink index.ts ..\..\projects\semantic-ui\src\public-api.ts & cd ..\..\..
scripts.link:mantic: rd /S/Q node_modules\@mantic-ui\angular & mkdir @mantic-ui\angular & cd @mantic-ui\angular && mklink /D lib ..\..\projects\mantic-ui\src\lib & mklink index.ts ..\..\projects\mantic-ui\src\public-api.ts & cd ..\..\..
scripts.link:mantic-doc: rd /S/Q node_modules\@mantic-ui\angular-doc & mkdir @mantic-ui\angular-doc & cd @mantic-ui\angular-doc && mklink /D lib ..\..\projects\mantic-ui-doc\src\lib & mklink index.ts ..\..\projects\mantic-ui-doc\src\public-api.ts & cd ..\..\..
